main.title: CAP
description: Trade with confidence on the world's leading crypto asset platform
Join with fund managers on managing investment portfolios of cryptocurrencies

about_content: Suitable for user who are first time getting to know Digital Asset. Buying CAP can effectively avoid the risk with wide fluctuations.
Selecting the cryptocurrencies which perform excellent in the market every two weeks to find the most optimal risk-reward ratio.
The platform will update the currency basket from portfolio automatically and use quantitative algorithms to filter out the underperformed cryptocurrencies.
Adding trailing Stop-loss system can effectively reduce the risk and lock in the profit.
